Talk2303:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>When Mastro gets going, he can conduct
people right out of their seats and get
'em dancing.
I want my flute music to make everyone
smile and dance too!
Talk2304:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But we're not in our normal groove.
Our tempo is out of whack when we
<clr:0000>don't have the full group<clr:ffff>.
Greeting_Rain_W:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Rain makes such beautiful music,
doesn't it?
Talk2102:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>The <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff> here is also hiding in a
flower bud, too afraid to come out.<sp:0:4:0>If only <clr:0000>Pyper<clr:ffff> were here, we could go and
perform for her.
Talk2305:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I wish we could get the <clr:0000>whole group back
together<clr:ffff>. Then we could put on a really
fun show.
Talk2103:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>The <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff> here is also hiding in a
flower bud, too afraid to come out.<sp:0:4:0>If only she could hear the sound of
<clr:0000>Beetz<clr:ffff>'s drum, I think she might be
enticed to show herself.
Talk2306:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Ugh, I can't remember.<sp:5:1:0> <clr:0000>Eustus <clr:ffff>might
know something though.
Talk2104:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>The <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff> here is also hiding in a
flower bud, too afraid to come out.<sp:0:4:0>I wish that we could all go and perform for
her right now, but...
Talk2105:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>The <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff> here is also hiding in a
flower bud, too afraid to come out.<sp:0:4:0>If only <clr:0000>Eustus<clr:ffff> were here, we could go and
perform for her.
Talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hello, hello! I know you, traveler! We've
had a delightful development. Look!

I mean, listen! It's Eustus...<sp:5:0:0>he and his
horn are back in our troupe!
Talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>It's heartbreaking to think of the poor
fellow getting stuck in a hole on the way
to Rito Village.
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Note to self—Eustus doesn't get to drive the
cart anymore.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>

<sp:3:0:2:0800>But I'm glad he's out of his funk and fit
as a fiddle.

Eustus's horn will blow the Stable Trotters
back on course!
Talk2400:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>Beetz said he was heading to <clr:0000>Necluda<clr:ffff> in
the <clr:0000>southeast <clr:ffff>to look for something.

He appreciates anything new, so
maybe he went to see the <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>
in Kakariko Village.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I hope Beetz found whatever he was
looking for.
Talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oooh, if it isn't our biggest fan! Thanks to
you, Beetz and Pyper came back!
Talk2401:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I wish I knew something that could help
you.<sp:5:1:0> Have you tried asking <clr:0000>Beetz<clr:ffff>?
Talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Please accept my humblest gratitude for
easing their worries.

Thank you, most musically!


The Stable Trotters can once again boast
Beetz's precise rhythm and Pyper's
airy melodies.
Talk2402:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm happy to keep working on my own
music so we can build toward the
ultimate performance.
Talk3201:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseS_01>Our musical troupe has finally performed
for all the Great Fairies!<sp:0:4:0>I'm moved! I'm inspired! <sp:5:1:0>I'm beside
myself with joy!
Talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oooh, if it isn't our biggest fan! Thanks to
you, Beetz and Eustus came back!
Talk2200:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>We'll get by. <sp:5:1:0>We might not have the full
crew, but my beats will keep us going
when we're feeling down!
Talk3202:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you so much for not giving up and
forging on, despite all the obstacles.<sp:0:4:0>Every time the Great Fairies emerged in
response to our music, it gave all of us
in this troupe confidence in our playing!
Talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Please accept my humblest gratitude for
easing their worries.

Thank you, most musically!


With a beat that makes you dance and
a horn melody that brings sunshine to the
world, no one can resist us.
Greeting_Snow_W:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>When it snows, I feel wrapped in stillness.
As though nature absorbs all sound...
Talk2201:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>I've got an idea about little <clr:0000>Pyper<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>He went <clr:0000>southeast to Faron<clr:ffff>, saying
something about music in the subtropics.

I get the feeling he might have been
kind of confused.
Talk2404:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>You've truly been there for us when we've
needed you, traveler. That's an idea that
I'd like to bring into my playing more.
My horn can also truly be there for the
rest of the troupe—and through our
music, for travelers who come to hear us.
Talk3203:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you ever want to hear my beats, stop
by a stable.
<sp:0:4:0>If we're there, I'll give you a rhythm
to remember!
Talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oooh, if it isn't our biggest fan! Thanks to
you, Pyper and Eustus came back!
Talk2202:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>Huh. I can't remember, but <clr:0000>Pyper <clr:ffff>might
know something.
Talk2405:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But I fear that dream will not be
realized until our troupe can <clr:0000>perform
as a complete ensemble<clr:ffff>.
Talk3204:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The show's not over. <sp:5:1:0>Far from it! We're
just getting started.<sp:0:4:0>We'll keep playing and make audiences
smile all over the kingdom!
Talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Please accept my humblest gratitude for
easing their worries.

Thank you, most musically!


With Pyper up high and Eustus down low,
the Stable Trotters' signature sound is
back in range.
Talk3205:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>It's up to us to pour all our thoughts and
feelings into our music when we play.<sp:0:4:0>From now on, I want our music to soothe
every traveler who comes to the stables,
not just the Great Fairies!
Talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, oh! My warmest greetings! These
three have been singing your praises!

You've done so much to steady the wild
beating of my heart over worry for my
missing members.
Talk3206:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>I consider you an honorary member of
our grand Stable Trotters troupe.<sp:0:4:0>Might I know your name?
Talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>As our humble troupe leader, allow me to
express my utmost gratitude.<sp:0:4:0>Pyper takes us high, Eustus goes
low, Beetz gives the rhythm, Violynne
carries us through the melody...<sp:0:4:0>And, finally, I bring it all together!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01><sp:0:2:2:6400>Everyone! Ahem. ♪EVERYONE!♪
The Stable Trotters musical troupe is
overjoyed to welcome you back!
Talk3207:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS>Link, eh? Hmmm. <sp:5:1:0>So that's what we can
call the hero who saved our grand troupe.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>I'll remember that! <sp:5:0:0>I surely will remember!<sp:0:4:0>Our grand troupe will continue playing
for one and all under a new name.<sp:0:4:0>We are the Stable Trotters no more!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>In honor of this genuine hero, let us be
known as...<sp:5:1:0>the Stable Heroes!
Talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Every member is essential for our
signature sound.

Together, we are not just the Stable
Trotters.<sp:5:1:0> In my heart, we'll always be...

<sp:3:0:2:0800><sp:0:2:2:7d00>The Stable Gallopers!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_01>Attention, everyone! This is a new start
for the Stable Trotters!

May our performances let the Great
Fairies... <sp:5:1:0>No, all travelers...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:MiloyanTactPlayEnd_00>No, no! Let EVERYONE in the world be
awash in sweet, soothing music!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>You have done so much for us, I hardly
know where to begin!

Let me start with this. Thank you,<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:5:0:0><sp:0:2:2:6400> thank
you,<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:5:0:0><sp:0:2:2:6400> thank you,<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:5:0:0><sp:0:2:2:6400> thank you...

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>And THANK YOU! That's five thank-yous
from the five of us.
Talk2300:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>Eustus said something about heading off
to <clr:0000>Tabantha Bridge Stable<clr:ffff> and then to
nearby Hebra in the northwest.
But I don't know if he's anywhere in
that whole area now.
Talk2301:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Do you feel it? The beat that energizes
you when you're moving around, pushing
your body to the limit?
Or has all that travel got you down?<sp:5:1:0>
The first bar of music will blow that
exhaustion away!
Talk2302:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm still gonna give it my all, even if we
don't have everyone! Well, I might take
a nap first. But then I'll give it my all!
Talk3101:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I want to take the joy of our performances
on the road to the <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff> too.
